name: Shovelin' Stan and the Grave Rave
name_original: Shovelin' Stan and the Grave Rave
description:
Welcome, shovelin' Stan.  You and your trusty shovel must ensure that none of those pesky zombies leave the graveyard.

Move your feet and follow the beat! This rhythm based sidescroller is bound to get something moving. Created in 24 hours, for Summer Slow Games August 2020: Horror games. Theme of the jam: "Don't let it out"!

Music: https://soundcloud.com/rannek/coral

Art: Assets both stock/modified from https://hugues-laborde.itch.io/
